channel.title: Openning Client Via Site - Webclient Idea
channel.description:
Is their a way to have my client files in my website directory and they click a link on my site that opens the client like a normal client so they dont have to download my client they can simply go to my site click a link and the client opens then loads?
Reason as to why I dont want a normal webclient:
My client that im using is a 317 custom client I have been making for a while and it is virtually impossible to turn into a webclient ive tryed on multiple occasions it simply wont work
So is their anyone who can shed some light on my idea?

item.title: Openning Client Via Site - Webclient Idea
item.dc:creator: @EclipsedSkapez EclipsedSkapez
item.description:
@EclipsedSkapez wrote:

I do want a webclient but my client files prove almost impossible every time I try…

Read full topic

item.description:
@ethanhello wrote:

idk if thats possible, what your describing is a webclient… but you say you dont want a webclient :S?
